pages.text: Leafcutter Ants are neutral creatures that can be found in Jungle biomes.$(br2)They will harvest Leaf for the near trees for their colonies.$(br2)If you break a Leafcutter Anthill a Leafcutter Ant Queen will appears$(br2)This is a biggest and strongest version of the common worker Ant.
On death, Ant Queens may drop Leaftcutter Ant Pupa, this can be used in a Dirt or Grass block to create a new colony.
